info.name: YouTube – Minimalistic stylish look
info.description: This is basically just based off my other userstyle, Userstyles.org – Minimalistic stylish look. I decided to do this for YouTube as well. Please keep in mind that this style isn't completely done yet, if you find any issues let me know and I'll fix them!
info.additionalInfo:
2015-09-17 - initial release
2015-09-21 - fixed the search bar inputs
